subject: Mental Health
title: Genetics of Anxiety
description: A quick win: understand Genetics of Anxiety.

hook.text: If your parent has an anxiety disorder, your risk roughly doubles.

buildup.text: Twin studies show anxiety is about 30 to 40 percent heritable.

discovery.text: Multiple genes influence serotonin, GABA, and cortisol regulation.

climax.text: Epigenetics shows that trauma in one generation can affect the next.

punchline.text: Anxiety can run in families, not just memories.
